public class PlotOptionsPie
extends AbstractCommonPlotOptions

Returns:
the start angle
See Also:
setStartAngle(Number)

setStartAngle

public void setStartAngle(Number startAngle)
Sets the start angle of the pie slices in degrees where 0 is top and 90 right. Defaults to 0. Should be smaller than end angle.

Parameters:
startAngle -

getEndAngle

public Number getEndAngle()
Returns:
the end angle
See Also:
setEndAngle(Number)

setEndAngle

public void setEndAngle(Number endAngle)
Sets the end angle of the pie in degrees where 0 is top and 90 is right. Defaults to startAngle plus 360. Should be larger than start angle.

Parameters:
endAngle -

getInnerSize

public Object getInnerSize()
Returns:
The size of the inner diameter of the pie.
See Also:
#setInnerSize(Object)

setInnerSize

public void setInnerSize(String innerSize)
Sets the size of the inner diameter of the pie. A size greater than 0 renders a donut chart. Can be a percentage or pixel value. Percentages are relative to the size of the plot area. Pixel values are given as integers. Defaults to 0. Note: This relevant only for ChartType.PIE

Parameters:
innerSize - The inner size in percent (String)

setInnerSize

public void setInnerSize(Number innerSize)
Sets the size of the inner diameter of the pie. A size greater than 0 renders a donut chart. Can be a percentage or pixel value. Percentages are relative to the size of the plot area. Pixel values are given as integers. Defaults to 0. Note: This relevant only for ChartType.PIE

Parameters:
innerSize - The inner size in pixels (Number)

getSize

public Object getSize()
Returns:
The diameter of the pie.
See Also:
#setSize(Object)

setSize

public void setSize(String size)
Sets the diameter of the pie relative to the plot area. Can be a percentage (String) or pixel value (Number). Pixel values are given as integers. Defaults to "75%".

Parameters:
size - The size in percent (String)

setSize

public void setSize(Number size)
Sets the diameter of the pie relative to the plot area. Can be a percentage (String) or pixel value (Number). Pixel values are given as integers. Defaults to "75%".

Parameters:
size - The size in pixels (Number)

getCenter

public Object[] getCenter()
See Also:
#setCenter(Object, Object)

setCenter

public void setCenter(String left,
                      String top)
Sets the center of the pie chart relative to the plot area. Can be percentages or pixel values. Defaults to "50%", "50%". Note: This relevant only for ChartType.PIE

Parameters:
left - The left offset in percentages (String)
top - The top offset in percentages (String)

setCenter

public void setCenter(Number left,
                      Number top)
Sets the center of the pie chart relative to the plot area. Can be percentages or pixel values. Defaults to "50%", "50%". Note: This relevant only for ChartType.PIE

Parameters:
left - The left offset in pixels (Number)
top - The top offset in pixels (Number)
